title: Respond to Gas Station Drive-Off
description: A gas station manager needs to report a 'drive-off' incident where a customer filled their tank and left without paying.

tasks.description: Identify the transaction in the point-of-sale (POS) system that corresponds to the drive-off.
tasks.expected_outcome: The specific unpaid transaction is located.

tasks.description: Retrieve the CCTV footage from the corresponding pump and time to capture the vehicle's license plate.
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear image of the license plate is retrieved from the security system.

tasks.description: Log the incident in the company's loss prevention system and generate a report to be filed with local police.
tasks.expected_outcome: The incident is officially logged, and a police report is drafted.
